basic_info.description: Hello! I'm Yoonsuk Chang from South Korea. I recently changed my life path from criminal justice to computer science so that I can not only code my thoughts but also be able to work everywhere in the world! For those who are reading this message, I hope that we would work together in the near future! :) If you are interested in me, please check below!

projects.title: Seoul Crime Map (Single)
projects.description: This project is for non-Koreans who are not familiar with South Korea, especially Seoul, to show visualized data so that they would know how Seoul is compared to other cities

projects.title: REBORN (Team)
projects.description: It's a blockchain-based project for a used-golf-equipmen platform where you can buy or sell used golf stuff. When users sell their stuff to the platform, they get tokens as a reward, which they can use for buying stuff on the platform. I participated in this project as a front-end developer.

experience.company: John Jay College of Criminal Justice (CUNY), New York
experience.title: Master of Arts in International Crime and Justice
